{"id":1294744288,"question_id":6,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1718898394,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1294744288/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n \n        int sz = s.length();\n        string ans;\n        if(numRows == 1)\n            return s;\n\n        vector<vector<char>> ans_m(numRows, vector<char>(sz/(2*numRows-2)*2+2, ' '));\n\n        int col = 0;\n        int index = 0;\n        while(index <sz) {\n            //vertical\n            for(int j=0; j<numRows; j++) {\n                if(index >=sz )\n                    break;\n                ans_m[j][col] = s[index];\n                index++;\n            }\n            col++;\n            //diagonal up\n            for(int j=numRows-2; j>=1; j--) {\n                if(index >=sz )\n                    break;\n                ans_m[j][col] = s[index];\n                index++;\n                col++;\n            };\n        }\n\n        for(int i=0; i<ans_m.size(); i++) {\n            for(int j=0; j<ans_m[0].size(); j++) {\n                if(ans_m[i][j]!= ' ') \n                    ans.push_back(ans_m[i][j]);\n            }\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
